name: MelodieTalk
_source: s;Melodie;It might hurt to hear, but this is why I can't stand "civilization".
s;Melodie;Mhmm. His most noble highness, yada-yada-yada, ruthless betraying us.
s;Simon;...So your tribes never go to war?
s;Melodie;Oh, sure.{w} We bicker and fight.|But we don't try and wipe each other out.
s;Simon;I'm starting to understand the appeal,|but I don't think you'll truly convince me.
s;Melodie;I'm not expecting to, just gloating.|Good luck on your throne, Verstadt.
